name: Jam and graham go to mcdonalds to buy burgers - a twp fan game
name_original: Jam and graham go to mcdonalds to buy burgers - a twp fan game
description:
This project is based on twp, it uses twp models, music and backgrounds.

Controls: 

A: move left

D: move right

E: speak

C: continue speaking  

Space bar: Jump
